original_title: American Trial: The Eric Garner Story
overview: By depicting real-life witnesses and actual evidence in a courtroom setting, American Trial will tell the story of the trial that may have occurred had NYPD Officer Daniel Pantaleo been indicted for the killing of Eric Garner in Staten Island, New York. Using the trial as a conduit, this documentary will examine accountability, race and police/civilian relations in New York City and beyond.
tagline: You Are the Jury in the Trial That Never Happened
title: American Trial: The Eric Garner Story
